thread.title: Arkansas' Henry on Mackey Award midseason watch list

title: Arkansas' Henry on Mackey Award midseason watch list
text:
Arkansas' Henry on Mackey Award midseason watch list Arkansas tight end Hunter Henry is on the midseason watch list for the John Mackey Award Post to Facebook Arkansas' Henry on Mackey Award midseason watch list Arkansas tight end Hunter Henry is on the midseason watch list for the John Mackey Award  //on.kthv.com/1Lur9Un   Join the Conversation To   Arkansas' Henry on Mackey Award midseason watch list Associated Press, news source 4:49 p.m. CDT October 14, 2015 Hunter Henry CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
FAYETTEVILLE, Ark. (AP) - Arkansas tight end Hunter Henry is on the midseason watch list for the John Mackey Award. 
The award is named for NFL Hall of Famer John Mackey and is presented to the player selected as the top tight end in college football. 
Hunter has 21 receptions this season for 286 yards. He is one of 35 players on the midseason watch list. 
Semi-finalists for the award will be announced Nov. 16 and the finalists on Nov. 24. The winner will be announced Dec. 9 and presented with the award during a ceremony Dec. 10.
